Texts.Chs: 给你，上尉。一本阿威坎工艺指南，和一张真正独特的武器蓝图！
Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain. An Avikan Crafting Guide, and a blueprint for a truly unique weapon!

Texts.Chs: 你想学习更多关于阿威坎工艺的知识吗？^green;那就先从^orange;沙行喷射者^green;、orange;沙地爬行者^green;、^orange;蜇翅虫群^green;和^orange;凡拉赫^green;身上收集特殊的材料^white;，之后我会给你一本^orange;阿威坎工艺指南^white;，加上一张我正在研制的武器的^orange;特别蓝图^white;。
Texts.Eng: How would you like to learn more about Avikan crafting techniques? ^green;Gather special materials from a ^orange;Sandspitter^green;, ^orange;Sandcrawler^green;, ^orange;Stingwing Swarm^green;, and a ^orange;Valahr^white;, and I will give you an ^orange;Avikan Crafting Guide^white;, plus a ^orange;special blueprint ^white;for a weapon I'm working on.
